name: Space Pit Stop: A Lunar Lander Experience
name_original: Space Pit Stop: A Lunar Lander Experience
description:
You were on your way back to your home planet, when suddenly you realize you are almost out of power! Luckily, there is a recharge station on a nearby asteroid, but there are many obstacles in the way. Reach the recharge station without running out of fuel.

Controls: A=Left, D=Right, W=Up, S=Down

Music:

"Bleeping Demo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
